paper_abstract: Let be a lattice, obtained from a module in a totally real algebraic number field. Let G be an axis parallel parallelepiped, and let |G| be a volume of G. In this paper we prove that lim sup(vertical bar G vertical bar ->infinity) vertical bar Gamma#(Gamma boolean AND G ) - vertical bar G vertical bar vertical bar / ln(s-1 vertical bar)G vertical bar >0 Thus the known estimate det Gamma# ( Gamma boolean AND G ) = vertical bar G vertical bar + O(ln(s-1)vertical bar G vertical bar) is exact. We obtain also a similar result for the low discrepancy sequence corresponding to Gamma .
paper_title: On the Lower Bound in the Lattice Point Remainder Problem for a Parallelepiped
